buddhashasana amathyanshaya - ithihasaya buddha shasana amathyanshaye ithihasaya shri lankawe bauddhagama prawardhanaya karamin bauddha katayuthu pilibandawa bauddha katayuthu departhamenthuwa kriyathmaka wemin pawathi awadhiyaka 1988 juni masa 16 wani dina bauddha katayuthu amathyanshaya namin ema karyayanta adalawa palamuwathawata amathyanshayak sthapitha kara atha.

esema kadulu rakimehi da suwisheshi daskam dakwana ohu pithikaranaya, pandu yawima saha pandu rakima yana theanshayenma daskam dakwanneki.esema roshan mahanamagen pasu shri lankawen bihi wu athiwishishta pandu rakinnaku wana ohu jonti rodgen pasu jathyanthara krikat pitiye kapi penena pandu rakinna lesa da wicharaka pasasumata lak wuweki.palamu pela tharaga 201 kadi shathaka 30 k ardha shathaka 49 k samanga lakunu 11656 k laba athi dilshan shri lanka ee sanchithaye sitimin tharaga 298 kadi shathaka 17 k ardha shathaka 42 k samangin lakunu 8783 k labamin shri lanka jathika kandayamata therini.1999 nowambar 18 sita 22 dakwa bulawayo hidi simbabweta erehiwa tharaga wademin test waram labagath dilshan 2010 desambara 01 wanida mahanuwara pallekale di batahira indiya kodew kandayamata erehiwa krida karana thek test tharaga 66 kadi inim 105 kata krida karamin nodawim 11 k samanga lakunu 3990 k laba thibe.

gothrika samajayedi siya gothrayen pitatha minisun sathuran lesa salakuwada, nitharama siya gothrikayin kalli gasennata, wen wannata uthsaha kalada, an gothrikayinge adahili ha wishwasa hela dakinnata pelambaunada ee gathi pawathum sahena durakata wenas karagena an matha, an jathikayin saha owunge adahili, wishwasa iwasimata ha eeta garu kirimata pawa owun daksha lesa samath wuha.
